name: Monster Truck Dash
description:
Truck Games For Kids Free:Boys - the new free hill climb monster truck games!

This new monster truck game is a fun physic hill climb games for kids. The game is simple, go fast, climb hills and collect as many diamonds on your way without crashing! You can go fast, but be careful to not crash your monster truck or it will explode!

If you or your kids are looking for a fun new truck games, stop searching! With a beautiful sound track and sound effects, this truck game will be a blast with everyone. Collect as many diamonds and upgrade your monster truck with a better one. There is 5 trucks to choose from and the location of the race will change on every gameplay! You will soon master your truck crashing skills!

But wait! If you buy a new monster truck, be careful! Don't flip over or you beautiful new truck will explode!
Does your kids like to play with trucks or cars? This fun monster truck games for kids is an cool driving experience. Easy controls makes the game fun to play for boys, girls and even preschool children.

Features of Truck Games For Kids Free:Boys:
- FREE to play
- 5 AWESOME Monster trucks with different driving specifications!
- Cool music and sound effects
- HD Graphics
- Easy controls, even for kids
- Awesome 2d physics
- Support HD tablets and Phones

If your kids enjoys big trucks, then this game is the perfect fit.
Download and play Truck Games For Kids Free:Boys now, the best truck racing games!!
